nodes.text: The Rooted Depths was the name given to a large cave on the northern edge of the Tangled Grove on the moon Oricon. During the Dread War, a creature known as the Bothrium Beast made its home in the cave, but was slain.

The Rooted Depths was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as part of Game Update 2.4: The Dread War. It is the site of two faction-specific yet identical missions—"Scarred Paradise" for Imperial players and "Haunted Paradise" for Republic players—and the repeatable Daily version of that mission, "False Paradise."
